features: 【Multifunctional Linux System】 The R36S runs on a 64-bit Linux system, supports 32-bit apps, and offers wired controller compatibility, making it more than just a gaming device.
【3500mAh Battery】 Enjoy extended playtime of 7-8 hours with the R36S, featuring a 3.5-inch IPS full-view screen with 640x480 resolution for an immersive gaming experience.
【Compact and Portable】 Designed for convenience, the R36S's lightweight and small form factor, along with a protective case, makes it ideal for travel and on-the-go gaming.
【High-Definition IPS Screen】The console's 3.5-inch 640x480 IPS display delivers vivid colors and sharp details, enhancing your gaming experience.
【Ideal Gift Option】At 17.4cm x 8.4cm x 2.1cm, the R36S is a perfect handheld size for gamers of all ages, making it a great gift for various occasions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Retro Gaming Reimagined Discover the R36S Retro Handheld Game Console, blending nostalgia with modern tech. It's a nod to gaming's golden era, revamped with an open-source Linux system for vast game compatibility. Enjoy classic and new gaming experiences on the go.

Specification CPU RK3326 Quad-Core ARM 64bit Cortex-A35 CPU up to 1.5GHz RAM 1GB DDR3L Screen 640*480 3.5-inch IPS full viewing angle,2.5D glass,zero distance OCA full fit Wireless 2.4/5G WIFI 802.11a/b/g/n/ac,Bluetooth 4.2 Support PSP/DC/SS/PS1/NDS/N64 /CPS1/CPS2/CPS3/NEOGEO/GBA/GBC/GB/SFC/FC/MD... Battery Li-polymer 3200 mAh,lasting 7 hours. System ArkOS open source linux system Storage 64GB/128GB SD ROMs

What games can I play on the R36S Retro Handheld Game Console? The R36S supports over 20 types of emulators, including PSP, DC, N64, PS1, SFC, GBA, NDS, PCE, MD, NEOGEO, GBC, and others, with over 15,000 built-in games. Can I play with a friend? The R36S has an OTG port at the bottom, which can be used with an adapter cable for big screen mirroring or for connecting controllers to enable two-player gaming. What's in the box? R36S game console *1, screen procter *1, charging cable *1,instruction manual *1
